name: Low-Carb Keto Bread
author: Girly Hobbies
summary: This recipe is lower in cholesterol than most low-carb breads and uses only 4 whole eggs. It's keto, Paleo, wheat free, gluten free, and celiac, and diabetes-friendly. The best part is that it's less eggy than most low-carb breads.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease an 8x4-inch loaf pan with cooking spray
Mix almond flour, coconut flour, baking powder, xanthan gum, and salt together in a large bowl
Combine eggs and egg whites in a food processor; pulse until well beaten
Add almond flour mixture, butter, coconut oil, and grapeseed oil
Pulse until a smooth batter forms
Spread batter in the prepared loaf pan
Bake in the preheated oven until top is browned, about 40 minutes
Cool in the pan, about 15 minutes
Invert onto a cooling rack to finish cooling
